title: Romantic Conversation with Mia
speaker: Mia
text: The sunset looks absolutely beautiful tonight! I love how the golden light reflects on the water. It makes me feel so peaceful... especially when I'm sharing this moment with someone special like you.

choices.text: You're more beautiful than any sunset, Mia.

effects.dialogue: *blushes deeply* You always know exactly what to say to make my heart flutter...

choices.text: I love watching sunsets with you too.

effects.dialogue: Thank you for being here with me. These moments mean everything to me.

choices.text: It really is a beautiful evening.

effects.dialogue: Yes, it is! I'm so glad we can enjoy it together.
Oh my! You're so thoughtful! What is it?
